dmca.title: DMCA Complaint from Fleener Web Hosting for prizewebhosting.com
dmca.body:
We are unable to locate on the web page prizewebhosting.com/dtos.html any of the material that you claim is being infringed as of 2:46:12 p.m. (GMT-6). Legal Response Team ThePlanet.com -----Original Message----- From: FWH Abuse Center [mailto:abuse@fleenerwebhost.com] Posted At: Sunday, October 22, 2006 4:07 PM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: DMCA Complaint from Fleener Web Hosting for prizewebhosting.com Subject: Re: DMCA Complaint from Fleener Web Hosting for prizewebhosting.com Dear Sirs, I have checked this site of DMCA copyright complaint: http://www.copyscape.com/view.php?us=fleenerentp&ch=732a578&o=60637&u=ht tp%3A%2F%2Fprizewebhosting.com%2Fdtos.html&t=1161550492&s=http%3A%2F%2Fw ww.fleenerwebhost.com%2Ftos1.html&w=19&c= It has not been changed or removed yet. You need to get this removed or suspend this site within 24 hours, I am just about ready to file complaint. Thank you! ----- Original Message ----- From: To: ; Sent: Wednesday, October 18, 2006 1:47 PM Subject: DMCA Complaint from Fleener Web Hosting for prizewebhosting.com > To Whom It May Concern: > > This letter confirms that access to the materials referenced in your below-pasted complaint has been disabled. > > Legal Response Team > The Planet > > > > --------- > > > 1. Notification of Copyright Infringement Added by system at Monday, Oct > 16 2006 08:31 pm > X-MailFrom: abuse@fleenerwebhost.com > X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net > Received: from [70.87.6.110] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for > ; Mon, 16 Oct 2006 21:29:42 -0500 > Received: from [72.232.76.194] (helo=detroit.dnsdc4.com) by > mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from abuse@fleenerwebhost.com) with > esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) > (Exim) > id 1GZei2-0001Kb-07; > boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0020_01C6F15A.5AEA6820" > X-Priority: 1 > X-MSMail-Priority: High > X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Express 6.00.2800.1409 > Disposition-Notification-To: "FWH Abuse Center" > > X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2800.1409 > X-AntiAbuse: This header was added to track abuse, please include it > with any abuse report > X-AntiAbuse: Primary Hostname - detroit.dnsdc4.com > X-AntiAbuse: Original Domain - theplanet.com > X-AntiAbuse: Originator/Caller UID/GID - [0 0] / [47 12] > X-AntiAbuse: Sender Address Domain - fleenerwebhost.com > X-Source: > X-Source-Args: > X-Source-Dir: > Received-SPF: none (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: 72.232.76.194 is neither > permitted nor denied by domain of fleenerwebhost.com) > client-ip=72.232.76.194; envelope-from=abuse@fleenerwebhost.com; > helo=detroit.dnsdc4.com; > X-OriginalArrivalTime: 17 Oct 2006 02:29:42.0819 (UTC) > FILETIME=[1A786730:01C6F194] > > (multipart/alternative) > Multipart prefix (text/plain) > This is a multi-part message in MIME format. > > MIME element (text/plain) > Notification of Copyright Infringement > Date: October 16, 2006 > > To Whom It May Concern:, > > I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of Fleener Web Hosting who own > exclusive rights to all textual portions of the Terms of Service located > http://www.fleenerwebhost.com/tos1.html. > > We have not authorized the use of our Terms of Service text at this > location: http://prizewebhosting.com/dtos.html > > Please suspend/remove the GUI and files and prevent future abuse. > > Please review the following page which highlights the exact textual > portions copied from our Terms of Service: > http://www.copyscape.com/view.php?o=4507&u=http%3A%2F%2Fprizewebhosting. > com%2Fdtos.html&t=1161048143&s=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.fleenerwebhost.com%2Ftos > 1.html&w=19&c= > > Formality: > I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an agent > authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual > property rights, and with said exclusive owners being named: > > Fleener Web Hosting > 6742 Western Ave., Suite 14 > Buena Park, CA 90621 > United States > > I have a good faith belief that the items or materials listed are not > authorized by the above intellectual property owners, their agents, or > the law and therefore infringes their rights. I further aver the > information contained in this notice is accurate. > > I may be contacted at: > Bobby Fleener > 6742 Western Ave., Suite 14 > Buena Park, California 90621 > Email: abuse@fleenerwebhost.com > > Regards, > > Bobby Fleener > Owner > > Fleener Enterprises DBA Fleener Web Hosting http://www.fleenerentp.com > > http://www.fleenerwebhost.com > > MIME element (text/html) > > name=GENERATOR> >

Notification of Copyright Infringement
